title: Client Shows reconnect after my game has finished
body: Ive  just finished a game, it was a surrender and instead of continuing  to the score screen i went afk for a few mins and came back to que up again but now its trying to reconnect me to the same game. I have tried restarting my league client, PC and also changed WiFi adapter setting , because i saw a thread saying that was the cause but still not working :/.

replies.body: It's possible you experienced a ghost game. This happens when something essentially doesn't get the message that the game is over. Ghost games go away on their own, and usually don't persist for more than an hour or two. If you're still having this issue now, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
